definition.en:
Represents an item that requires work or attention. Tickets exist in the context of a project (which may or may not be a version-control repository), and are used to track ideas, proposals, tasks, bugs and more.
see [3](https://forgefed.peers.community/ns#Ticket)
definition.de:
Represents an item that requires work or attention. Tickets exist in the context of a project (which may or may not be a version-control repository), and are used to track ideas, proposals, tasks, bugs and more.
siehe [3](https://forgefed.peers.community/ns#Ticket)
definition.fr:

voir [3](https://forgefed.peers.community/ns#Ticket)
definition.es:
Represents an item that requires work or attention. Tickets exist in the context of a project (which may or may not be a version-control repository), and are used to track ideas, proposals, tasks, bugs and more.
ver [3](https://forgefed.peers.community/ns#Ticket)

example.en:
```json { "@context": [ "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams", "https://forgefed.peers.community/ns" ], "type": "Ticket", "id": "https://example.dev/alice/myrepo/issues/42", "context": "https://example.dev/alice/myrepo", "attributedTo": "https://dev.community/bob", "summary": "Nothing works!", "content": "

Please fix. Everything is broken!

", "mediaType": "text/html", "source": { "content": "Please fix. *Everything* is broken!", "mediaType": "text/markdown; variant=CommonMark" }, "assignedTo": "https://example.dev/alice", "isResolved": false }```

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
